title: (x) GSK Cervarix Logo Fonts ID - Gill Sans, Helvetica Condensed {Lex}
content:
Hello good people of Typophile. I'm working on a project with the following logo and need some help identifying the two fonts they've used.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310192420im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cervarix_5844.png)

Any assistance would be greatly appreciated!
author: SarahA

comments.content:
Gill sans and Helvetica Condensed?

- Lex
